name: Island Hopper (Boar)
description:
My first proper game project that I committed to releasing for people to play.

Somehow this became a birthday present for my friend Silence, now immortalized as Captain Shushbeard chasing you between islands.

Tweaked/re-uploaded a couple times based on feedback to make a smoother playing experience.

Our best time is 2:00, see if you can beat it!
